snippet: A suicide car bomber struck a security force’s convoy on Thursday in northern Somalia, killing at least seven people and wounding 37.
abstract: Suicide car bomber strikes security force's convoy in northern Somalia, near the semiautonomous region of Puntland, killing at least seven people and wounding 37.
lead_paragraph: A suicide car bomber struck a security force’s convoy on Thursday in northern Somalia, killing at least seven people and wounding 37.

headline.main: Somalia: Suicide Bomber Attacks Convoy in the North
headline.print_headline: Somalia: Suicide Bomber Attacks Convoy in the North
